title: Busch Gardens Tampa Bay
text: PLAY [Things to Do] World-class events start with world-inspired venues! From animals roaming on our Serengeti Plain at Busch Gardens to award-winning entertainment on our elegant white sand beaches at Adventure Island, we give you truly remarkable event opportunities right here in Tampa. Take a look at our outstanding park options that offer everything from spectacular outdoor dining areas to grand, air-conditioned venues. All settled against the dramatic backdrop of Tampa's most beautiful and thrilling parks.
